Experience & Expertise

Meet William H. Carter, the experienced owner and craftsman behind Upstate Home Remodel. With extensive experience in carpentry, plumbing, electrical work, and general remodeling, William is committed to providing exceptional home improvement services that homeowners can trust.

His attention to detail and skilled craftsmanship ensures every project is completed to the highest standards, transforming houses into dream homes throughout Upstate South Carolina.
